name: SimplyDiscoRadio
0:
”Alexa, play Simply Disco Radio”
”Alexa, open Simply Disco Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simply disco radio
des: Step back in time with Simply Disco Radio on SimplyRadio.com. Experience the music that started countless dance scenes, playing the hottest disco hits, rare tracks, and eclectic DJ-mixed sets around the clock. Rediscover the magic of disco as our expertly programmed station brings to life the iconic beats that set dance floors on fire. Immerse yourself in a non-stop dance party that echoes the legendary nights of Studio 54 and discotheques worldwide. Enjoy the best disco hits and fantastic DJ-mixed sets that recreate the atmosphere of those magical nights. Let Simply Disco Radio transport you to a world of flashing lights and never-ending dance, offering you the timeless allure of a legendary era, anytime and anywhere.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
